title: Associated constants error: unconstrained generic constant
body:
The following code:

```rust
#![feature(generic_const_exprs)]

pub trait HType {
    type Slot;
    const SLOT_SIZE: usize;

    fn into(self) -> [Self::Slot; Self::SLOT_SIZE];
}

fn convert<T>(value: T) where T: HType {
    let _array: [T::Slot; T::SLOT_SIZE] = value.into();
}
```

cause an error:

```
error: unconstrained generic constant
  --> src/main.rs:11:49
   |
11 |     let _array: [T::Slot; T::SLOT_SIZE] = value.into();
   |                                                 ^^^^
   |
   = help: try adding a `where` bound using this expression: `where [(); Self::SLOT_SIZE]:`
note: required by a bound in `HType::into`
  --> src/main.rs:7:35
   |
7  |     fn into(self) -> [Self::Slot; Self::SLOT_SIZE];
   |                                   ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ required by this bound in `HType::into`
```

If we add the constrait to the trait:

```rust
pub trait HType where [(); Self::SLOT_SIZE]: {
    type Slot;
    const SLOT_SIZE: usize;

    fn into(self) -> [Self::Slot; Self::SLOT_SIZE];
}
```

It causes another error:

```
error[E0391]: cycle detected when building an abstract representation for HType::{constant#0}
 --> src/main.rs:3:28
  |
3 | pub trait HType where [(); Self::SLOT_SIZE]: {
  |                            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  |
note: ...which requires building THIR for `HType::{constant#0}`...
 --> src/main.rs:3:28
  |
3 | pub trait HType where [(); Self::SLOT_SIZE]: {
  |                            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
note: ...which requires type-checking `HType::{constant#0}`...
 --> src/main.rs:3:28
  |
3 | pub trait HType where [(); Self::SLOT_SIZE]: {
  |                            ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
  = note: ...which again requires building an abstract representation for HType::{constant#0}, completing the cycle
note: cycle used when checking that `HType` is well-formed
 --> src/main.rs:3:1
  |
3 | pub trait HType where [(); Self::SLOT_SIZE]: {
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

```

## Version

```
rustc 1.62.0-nightly (e745b4ddb 2022-04-07)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: e745b4ddbd05026c75aae4506aef39fdfe1603c5
commit-date: 2022-04-07
host: aarch64-apple-darwin
release: 1.62.0-nightly
LLVM version: 14.0.0
```

## Related Issues

- [feature(generic_const_exprs)](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/76560)
